Description: Example 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  voltage: 222.6,
  active_power: 1,
  power_factor: 100,
  power_consumption: 1,
  switch_1: 'on',
  switch_2: 'off',
  switch_3: 'off',
  switch_4: 'off',
  switch_5: 'off',
  switch_6: 'off',
  switch_7: 'off',
  switch_8: 'off',
  total_current: 2
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryVoltage: { unitId: 'V', record: 222.6 },
  power: { unitId: 'W', record: 1, nature: 'Active power' },
  energy: { unitId: 'Wh', record: 1, nature: 'Power consumption' },
  current: { unitId: 'mA', record: 2, nature: 'Total current' },
  per: { unitId: '%', record: 100, nature: 'Power factor' }
}
